---
title: Modules
---

This page lists the main modules in the package for quick navigation.

- `rich_color_ext.css` — CSS colour utilities and `CSSColor` helper class.
- `rich_color_ext.patch` — Monkey-patch helpers for `rich.color.Color.parse`.
- `rich_color_ext.hex_utils` — Helpers for 3-digit hex expansion and validation.
- `rich_color_ext.cli` — CLI entry point.
- `rich_color_ext.logger` — Internal logging wrapper.

Click the module names in the Reference navigation to see the auto-generated
API docs.
